vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Reuben living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.16.1;
son of: Eliab (H0446H);
brother of: Dathan (H1885) and Nemuel (H5241)
§ Abiram = "my father is exalted" or "(the) Exalted One is (my) father"
1) a Reubenite, son of Eliab in exodus
2) son of Hiel the Bethelite who worked to rebuild Jericho
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hombre; tribu de Rubén; (b)   hijo de Hiel
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比蘭 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我父被頌揚" 或 "(那)被頌揚的是(我)父"
1) 一位流便人, 出埃及時的以利押的兒子 (民 16:1)
2) 伯特利人希伊勒的兒子, 希伊勒曾重修耶利哥城 (王上 16:34)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚比兰 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我父被颂扬" 或 "(那)被颂扬的是(我)父"
1) 一位流便人, 出埃及时的以利押的儿子 (民 16:1)
2) 伯特利人希伊勒的儿子, 希伊勒曾重修耶利哥城 (王上 16:34)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.16.34;
son of: Hiel (H2419);
brother of: Segub (H7687)
§ Abiram = "my father is exalted" or "(the) Exalted One is (my) father"
1) a Reubenite, son of Eliab in exodus
2) son of Hiel the Bethelite who worked to rebuild Jericho
